title: Walk Through a Sample Application and Discover Cache Diagnostics Unit

questions.title: 1An API call to fetch data takes the most time, SOQL queries are faster, and fetching data from the cache is the fastest way to get data. When should you use the API or SOQL queries compared to the cache?

answers.content: A Make API calls to refresh external data when necessary. Optionally, store data in Salesforce temporarily as a way to resupply the cache without having to make API calls often. Get the data from the cache whenever possible.
B Make API calls on a regular basis to refresh your data. Either store and retrieve the data through SOQL or the cache.
D To save time, only get the data from the cache (provided the chipmunk hasn't eaten it).

wrongAnswers.content: C When not using external data from API web services, retrieve data from Salesforce through SOQL queries to refresh your data when necessary and store data in the cache for fast retrieval.

questions.title: 2Your app displays data using a list of custom object records. The purpose is to reduce app processing time. Assume your app is below cache storage limits. How should the cache values be stored?

answers.content: C Store the data as a list of sObjects with one key.

wrongAnswers.content: D Store the data as instances of your own custom class.
A Store the data as sObjects in the cache with multiple keys.
B Store the data as fields, then convert them to sObjects before displaying them.

correctAnswer.content: C Store the data as a list of sObjects with one key.

questions.title: 3Your app displays bus schedules for a transportation agency. Storing all the schedules in the cache would exceed cache limits. You know that only a handful of bus schedules are requested most. Which of the following options are best to store schedules in the cache?

answers.content: C All schedules stored in separate keys. The key used least recently might get evicted from the cache.

wrongAnswers.content: A A list of randomly selected schedules
B Assuming that the list of most requested schedules is provided and doesn't change, store the most requested schedules and a key for each bus schedule.
